description: The statistics were confirmed before new figures revealed 28 more people had died with Covid-19.
title: Coronavirus: Almost half of Irish Covid-19 deaths in care homes
title_page: Coronavirus: Almost half of Irish Covid-19 deaths in care homes - BBC News
maintext: "The mortality, we know, is higher than in the general population simply because of the frailty and vulnerability of some of the population within that care setting," she added.
